title: Highest subsidies and transfers
description: In 2022, Belgium allocated 84.99% of its expenses to subsidies and other transfers, the highest percentage globally.

title: Most nurses and midwives per capita
description: Belgium had 20.89 nurses and midwives per 1,000 people in 2022, the highest ratio in the world.

title: Lowest prevalence of underweight children
description: In 2023, only 0.3% of children under 5 in Belgium were underweight, the lowest prevalence globally.

title: Lowest prevalence of underweight girls
description: In 2023, only 0.2% of girls under 5 in Belgium were underweight, the lowest prevalence worldwide.

title: Lowest prevalence of wasting in boys
description: In 2023, only 0.2% of boys under 5 in Belgium experienced wasting, the lowest rate globally.

title: Lowest rate of child marriage
description: In 2020, only 0.1% of Belgian women aged 20-24 were married by age 18, the lowest rate in the world.
